name: Access Security Systems Pvt Ltd
overview:
We are Security Solutions provider with a sound sourcing network,for Digital Video Security & Surveillance Systems (CCTV),Alarm Systems, Biometric Time & Attendance System, Access Control, Video Intercom systems, Cash bag Alarm, Car Reverse Sensors.

With safety & security of human lives & property as our top most priority, we provide tailor made Security Solutions for Offices, Factories, Buildings, Supermarkets/shops, Hotels, Hospitals/clinics, Jewellery, Ware houses,Schools, Colleges, Banks and HOMES. We have tie-ups with the leading manufacturers to bring the best brands known for their technical superiority, precision, long-life. We help you manage your family and business with peace of mind as you are in total control wherever you are.

milestones.description: Home Security System is india base company in the field of home security, business video surveillance systems and monitoring services.
